title: Mates, Dates Boxed Set One: Mates, Dates, and Inflatable Bras; Mates, Dates, and Cosmic Kisses; Mates, Dates, and Designer Divas; Mates, Dates, and Sleepover Secrets
description: Lucy, Izzie, Nesta, and T. J. are always there for one another through the many ups and downs that come with being teens. Filled with romance, comedy, and good girly fun, it;s always an adventure with these girls! Mates, Dates fans, as well as new readers, can collect the first four books in this popular series.
author: Cathy Hopkins
